title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 1-1.5 - Partnership and partner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 1-1.5 - Partnership and partner

State Regulations

Tax Law, section 2(6)
(a) The term "partnership" shall have the
same meaning as set forth in IRC section 761(a) and
26 CFR section
1.761-1(a), whether or not
the election provided for therein has been made. Also, the term "partnership"
does not include a corporation within the meaning of section
1-1.2
of this Subpart. (b) The term "partnership," unless the
context requires otherwise, includes a limited liability company or other
business entity classified as a partnership for Federal income tax
purposes. (c) The term "partner"
shall have the same meaning as set forth in IRC section 761(b) and shall
include a member of a limited liability company classified as a partnership for

Federal income tax purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
1-1.5

Adopted

New

York State Register December 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 52, eff. 12/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
